name: ipfs-elastic-provider-bucket-to-indexer
description: Converts trigger from S3 to a message to send to indexer SQS
author: Francisco Ferreira Cardoso <francisco.cardoso@nearform.com>

scripts.invoke: aws lambda invoke --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --region $AWS_REGION --function-name $LAMBDA --payload file://event.json --log-type Tail /dev/null | jq -r .LogResult | base64 -d
